Author: Pipergnome
Text: Get a bag of peas or corn from your fridge and feel it with your hands. Keep focusing on it. Even put the bag to your face. The coolness with take you out of your head.   Or splash some cold water on your face. You’re stuck in your head. Bring awareness to your physical state.   My therapist has suggested this for my panic attacks. It helps

Author: bloodthirstythin
Text: When I need distraction I drink tea or take a shower or sit in bed until the feeling passed. At least if I’m sitting in bed I’m not sitting in the bathroom.
